title: Tuesday Post Show (11-2-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (11-2-21)
description:
Bobby starts with a story that most parents would be okay with buying knock-off toys for their kids to save money. Raymundo shares a “Country Music Secret” who would line dance every Friday night at his college town. A caller shares their favorite Raging Idiots song and Bobby shares a story about what happened during the performance of the song where Eddie forgot the words. Another caller has a problem with her brother having a body odor problem. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
